title: Digimon Zero Two - S02E50
description:
Synopsis:
The story starts again three years later, in April 2002. T. K. and Kari, now 11 years, starting the 5th year when they are called back to duty. However, as the elders are busy, between school, club and personal life, come three new Chosen Children: Davis, Yolei and Cody.

Then formed a new group of DigiDestined, and while the older (especially Tai and Izzy) give a helping hand from time to time, is definitely a secondary role in history.

The enemy this time is the self-proclaimed Emperor Digimon, a boy who aspires to dominate and enslave the Digimon with the help of his Dark Tower, which prevent the Digimon of digivolved states. With the discovery Digieggs, the problem resolves itself, and then the children begin to destroy the Towers, one after another.

After defeating the Digimon Emperor: who actually called Ken, they discover that this is nothing less than a Chosen Child and then he becomes a member of the group. They continue to fight against evil, and with the help of the Chosen Children all over the world, overcome the enemy. Since then, all people get a partner Digimon and Digital World is open to all.

Twenty-five years later, we can see all the children with their adult children, who should continue the mission of the parents.

The second adventure is a little different from its predecessor, it is considerably more fun, active and mature. The animation and character design has evolved considerably, and the OST is excellent quality.

This story basically explains why almost everything that has happened before, and new things (like the existence of several other fantastic worlds and hundreds of other Chosen Children) and gives us a deeper perspective on the relationship Light / Darkness .

Furthermore, the characters change so much as one would expect in three years. They are more mature and show unknown facets (like the impressive dark side of TK) or simply new lifestyles. What also changes is the relationship between the Chosen, the strong bonds and semi-friendly rivalry add to idolatrous admiration, relations of strong mutual respect and a multitude of love triangles.
